Reading Circle


Book Club

Together with the Co-Liberative Computing research group, the LES cluster organizes a monthly online book club focused on reading books that explore the intersection of equity and justice in AI. You can find the schedule and the list of books here.

  • April 25, 2025, Waiting for Robots
  • March 28, 2025, Teaching to Transgress [summary]
  • February 28, 2025, The Promise of Access [summary]
  • January 31, 2025, Resisting AI [sumamry]
  • November 29, 2024, Design Justice [sumamry]
  • October 25, 2024, The Eye of the Master [sumamry]
  • September 27, 2024, Livig a Feminist Life [sumamry]
  • August 30, 2024, Unmasking AI [sumamry]
  • May 31, 2024, Data Feminism [sumamry]
  • April 26, 2024, Atlas of AI [sumamry]
  • March 28, 2024, The Ethical Algorithm [sumamry]
